Profile_Screen.title: Complete your profile
Profile_Screen.hint: Please enter your profile. Don't worry, only you can see your personal data. No one else will be able to see it. Or you can skip it for now.
Profile_Screen.hint_suc_msg:
Please wait...
Saving User Data Information.

Login_screen.msg: Please enter your email & password to log in.
Login_screen.hint_suc_msg:
Please wait...
You will be directed to the homepage.

Writing.hint1: Generate well-written articles on any topic you want.
Writing.hint2: Extract key points from long texts.

Creative.hint1: Generate stories from any given topic.

Business.hint1: Generate templates for emails, letters, etc.

Social Media.serchtitle1: Write an posts on LinkedIn about
Social Media.hint2: Write captions that attract audience on Instagram.

Developer.hint1: Write app & websites in any programming language.

Personal.hint1: Create sincere birthday wishes for loved ones.
Personal.hint2: Make an apology for the mistakes that have been made.

Others.hint1: Create conversation templates for two or more people.
Others.hint2: Write funny jokes to tell your friends and make them laugh.

ReviewSummary.title: Review Summary
ReviewSummary.subtitle: Subscription
ReviewSummary.hintproplan: You have successfully subscribed to Pro! E-Receipt has been sent to your email address. Enjoy the benefits!

proplan.freefeatures: Only available when demand is low,Slow response speed,New feature updates are slower
proplan.paidfeatures: Always available in any demand,Fast response speed,Priority access to new features,Advanced analytics,Dedicated support
